participant_1.name: Slava
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Slava is focused on achieving his goals, particularly in the finance world. He is sociable and enjoys sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i plan to go to business school next year. i drive a bmw.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Creative and friendly, Maya enjoys spending time with friends and has a playful spirit. She is emotionally reflective, often thinking about her past.
participant_2.background: i love to play board games. my parents were also teachers. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.

content.text:
Hi! What is your name? üòÇ.
Some facts about me: i drive a bmw
Hi! My name is Slava! I‚Äôd like to afford a bmw too. What do you usyally do for vacation?
yep , i can take you out sometime if you want !
Oh, it would be nice if you took me to the beach
i know right its like the perfect day to go for a ride. how is your evening going ?
Slow and steady, and yours?
it was awesome ! i went horseback riding with some friends . you ?
Cool, I was at the concert and finally managed ti see my favourite band
oh nice what is it ? i currently work a traditional office job
How is it like to work at office? My parents are teachers by the way
enjoy ! i lost my mother long years ago . i miss her . how are you this morning ? üôâ
Oh i‚Äôm sorry. I‚Äôm fine, you?
thanks . i sell snakeskin oil . it is a weird job .. Also, try to guess: my parents are ...
Teachers?
very wealthy bankers, funny you :)
Oh
yeah , and i've played it since the age of four .
Played what?
nothing big time yet , i still have to work full time to pay the bills .
Speak of playing, do you like board games?
i do not really have time between the other stuff and my volunteer job üßê
Sure A lot of jobs you have
do you smoke or drink ?
I‚Äôm a moderate drinker andI don‚Äôt smoke. Do you smoke?
howdy i am a baseball player
